data.title: Implement Normal Encoding
data.body: Implement the encode and decode for normal maps in the geometry and lighting fragment shaders.

data.title: Implement Camera Support in Render Pipeline

milestone.title: Version 0.3.0
milestone.description: Implement UI Support #20

data.body: There should be some method for the game script to set/control the cameras.  Camera class works fine, but the render pipeline doesn't know anything about the camera.

data.title: Feature: Mesh Generalization
data.body: Assimp mesh loading is implemented.

data.title: Feature: Parent Objects
data.body: This is a pretty basic system that allows you to parent objects to other objects, so that the child's transform is in the coordinate space of the parent.

data.title: Camera Follow Objects
data.body: Where ever the objects move, the camera always follows it.

data.title: Feature: Materials

milestone.title: Version 0.2.0
milestone.description:
## Better Rendering Support

#### This release adds more stable rendering and features.

Add Prefab Support #10
Add Parent Object Support #11
Rework Mesh Loading System #15
Implement Normal Map Support #16
Implement Directional & Ambient Lighting #17
Implement Point Lights #18
Finalize UI Support Planning #19

data.body: Added a basic material system for maintaining textures.

data.title: Change variables from console window
data.body:
I imagine syntax like `myObject.Position.x = 20`. The console could be done in-game via Awesomium if that's what we pick for the UI, or it could be a command-line window seperate from the game.

Prereq: threading

data.title: Reload yaml files

milestone.title: Version 0.3.0
milestone.description: Implement UI Support #20

data.body:
Is reloading a yaml file feasible? It would be great if we could reload and reset all the prefabs without having to close the engine. 

The next step beyond this would be diff reloading (only reload what changed), but I'm not about to ask for that.

data.title: Fix for AMD cards
data.body:
Everyone, even if you didn't have issues, should pull and test so we know if this is fixed for sure or not.
So far we've had success on my and Brandon's machines.

data.title: Rework Mesh loading system

milestone.title: Version 0.2.0
milestone.description:
## Better Rendering Support

#### This release adds more stable rendering and features.

Add Prefab Support #10
Add Parent Object Support #11
Rework Mesh Loading System #15
Implement Normal Map Support #16
Implement Directional & Ambient Lighting #17
Implement Point Lights #18
Finalize UI Support Planning #19

data.body:
[Assimp](http://assimp.sourceforge.net/index.html) is an object file importer that could replace the current model loading system.

[Also, it's already been ported to D](https://github.com/DerelictOrg/DerelictASSIMP3).

data.title: Rework shader loading system.

milestone.title: Version 0.2.0
milestone.description:
## Better Rendering Support

#### This release adds more stable rendering and features.

Add Prefab Support #10
Add Parent Object Support #11
Rework Mesh Loading System #15
Implement Normal Map Support #16
Implement Directional & Ambient Lighting #17
Implement Point Lights #18
Finalize UI Support Planning #19

data.body: So the previous way we did this with 192 was to scan for variables in the shaders, and then query their positions.  A potential rework of this system would be to have a meta data file of some sort that includes variable names (making it less of a pain to do arrays) and the positions of variables, so we could set them ourselves.  Thoughts or alternative ideas are welcome.

data.title: Mouse Support

milestone.title: Version 0.6.0
milestone.description:
## Alpha Release

The game will reach Alpha with this milestone.

data.body: We need to be able to click on things. This means we need to do a raytrace (or something similar) and return the first object on the screen.

data.title: Move Game Binaries to Binaries Folder

milestone.title: Version 0.1.0
milestone.description:
## Initial Stable Release

#### This is the first stable build of the engine.

The features being added are:
Implement Math Structures #1
Implement Shader Pipeline #2
Add Linux Support #4
Add Configurable Window Title #7

data.body: This will make the root folder much cleaner.
